text: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son...
The LORD is my shepherd I shall not want...
Rejoice! I repeat, rejoice in the Lord...
Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding...
Ask and it shall be given to you, seek and you shall find, knock and the door shall be opened unto you...
Come to me, all who labour and are overburdened, I will give you rest...
Teach a child how he should live, and he will remember it all his life...
